abstract: Family members and political figures gather for memorial in honor of Nobel Laureate Elie Weisel, who passed away earlier this year, at United States Holocaust Memorial Museum in Washington, DC; tributes commemorate Weisel's lifetime of political and humanitarian service and his major contributions to preservation of Jewish history and documentation of horrors and consequences of Holocaust.

headline.print_headline: Honoring a Holocaust Witness Whose Words Seared
headline.main: Honoring Elie Wiesel, a Holocaust Witness Who Kept a Memory Alive

snippet: Five months after the Holocaust survivor and Nobel laureate died, family members and political figures gathered at the United States Holocaust Memorial Museum to honor him....
lead_paragraph: Five months after the Holocaust survivor and Nobel laureate died, family members and political figures gathered at the United States Holocaust Memorial Museum to honor him.
